channel.title: { Viresh Gupta }
channel.description: Web Space of Viresh Gupta. Tech Enthusiast. Geek Stuff and Projects ;)

item.title: GSoC 2018 @ coala.io
item.description: I would be working on integrating ANTLRv4 in coala, to enable bear writers to write advanced linting tools based on parse trees of the source code.

item.title: ClubMan
item.description:
This is a club management software, which helps a club to highlight it’s activities, showcase members and their achievements.
It also provides a simple personalised web-page for all the members and a track of which member attended which event.

item.title: LogicX
item.description: This is an online judge intended to be used as a game for new programmers to learn the concepts of loops and operators.

item.title: iDabba
item.description: The project, named “iDabba” is a smart container which identifies what fruit/vegetable/item is kept in it ( the item has to be one of those trained for image analysis ), the surrounding temperature, humidity of the item, and its weight. All this information is visible to the user via a web app. The container designed is fuss-free, convenient and washable. We were motivated to design this project to easily solve everyday hassles in kitchens and households regarding spoilage and infestation. It can even be scaled to meet the needs of farmers and storage companies for smart storing options and act as a small-scale silo.

item.title: Schedulr
item.description: A javafx based program to handle the time table management of an institution Supports functionality for

item.title: Arm Assembly Simulator
item.description: A simulator for ARM assembly language subset. Reads machine code from a file and simulates it like an arm processor in a 5 stage cycle.

item.title: FinGame
item.description: A financial game aimed at teaching people more about finance, playable in levels, this game is a single player game with an optional two player mode, where one can compete against another friend and win. Aim of the game - Invest smart and end up with the maximum profit at the end of the game time.

item.title: Web Development for Esya'17
item.description: I developed the websites for Esya 2017. Fully developed the website and organised the annual hackathon hackIIITD and lead web developer for Esya 2017’s website.

item.title: Android Workshop Apps
item.description:
These are a collection of my android apps made during the applied CS with Android Workshop.
The following apps are open as of now :

  • Ghost : It is an implementation of the popular word game Ghost. Uses various data structure concepts like BST and Tries etc.
  • Anagram App : This app's goal is a game that requires users to generate all the anagrams they can by adding a letter to the given word. Uses sets, hashmaps etc.
  • Scarne's Dice: This app is a GUI making app for die rolling. Teaches asynchronous programming.
  • Puzzle 8: This is the classic game of Puzzle 8, implemented in Android with a custom image from camera. Uses A* algorithm for the AI part.

The independant Android Application made completely by self for the Code sprint during the workshop is an implementation of the Classic puzzle of Tower of Hanoi. [Source Code]
